SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
PARTNER RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT
User License and Experience Cloud Template Support for Partner Relationship Management

Partner Relationship Management (PRM) provides channel managers and partners with productivity features that help everyone work together. To gain access to PRM features, you must purchase the required licenses for each feature and your partner site must be built using Experience Cloud templates that support those features. Learn more about license requirements and feature availability in templates.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available for channel managers in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, Developer Editions with Sales Cloud or Service Cloud. You must have at least one PRM add-on license.
Available for partners in supported Experience Cloud sites, accessed through Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, Developer Editions with Sales Cloud or Service Cloud. A PRM add-on license is required for each partner user.
PRM Add-On Licenses

These Experience Cloud licenses provide access to PRM:

Partner Community license
Partner Community Login license
Channel Account license

You must have at least one PRM license to configure PRM. An additional PRM license is required for each partner user. For some features, add-on licenses are also required. The table in this topic lists those requirements.

Some PRM features are available to customers still using legacy partner portal licenses. We recommend upgrading legacy partner portal license users to a comparable Experience Cloud license.

PRM-Supported Experience Cloud Templates

Partners access PRM features from Experience Cloud sites, which are each built on an Experience Cloud site template. Vendors can choose from various templates that support PRM features.

The Partner Central template, for example, comes configured with several channel sales workflows set up for you. Other templates support PRM features but can require more configuration by your Salesforce admin and Experience Cloud site developer.

PRM User License and Template Support by Feature
FEATURE	LICENSE REQUIREMENTS	EXPERIENCE CLOUD TEMPLATE SUPPORT


Sales objects for partners:

Contacts
Accounts
Leads
Opportunities
Campaigns
	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic.	All Experience Cloud templates, with the purchase of Sales Cloud. For some templates, Salesforce admins must give partner users access to objects, and site developers must make sure that objects are added to Experience Cloud sites.
Sales list views for partners: Leads and Opportunities	One of the supported PRM licenses listed earlier in this topic.	
Partner Central
Aloha (no longer sold)
Salesforce Tabs + Visualforce (no longer sold)



Sales features for partners:

Lead Inbox
Deal registration quick action menu
	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic.	
Partner Central
Aloha (no longer sold)
Salesforce Tabs + Visualforce (no longer sold)



Sales Cloud Einstein features for partners:

Lead Scoring
Opportunity Scoring
	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic, plus Sales Cloud Einstein.	
Partner Central
Automotive
Build Your Own (Aura)
Financial Service Client Portal
Insurance Agent Portal
Manufacturing



Enhanced list views for partners:

Contact Intelligence
Lead Intelligence
Pipeline Inspection
	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic. Some features require Sales Cloud Einstein.	
Partner Central
Build Your Own (Aura)
Financial Service Client Portal
Insurance Agent Portal
Manufacturing



Analytics features for partners:

Reports
Dashboards
	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic.	All Experience Cloud templates


Marketing features for partners:

Campaign Management
Salesforce CMS
	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic.	
Partner Central
Aloha (no longer sold)
Salesforce Tabs + Visualforce (no longer sold)



Service objects for partners:

Cases
Knowledge
	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic.	Cases is available in all Experience Cloud templates with the purchase of Sales Cloud or Service Cloud. Knowledge is available in all templates with the purchase of Service Cloud.
Service feature Einstein Bots for partners	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic.	
Partner Central
Customer Service Template



Features for channel managers

Partner accounts
Collaborative Forecasts
Channel Management Console
	Channel Management PRM features are available to channel managers in Salesforce when you purchase at least one of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic.	

Channel managers access partner accounts and Collaborative Forecasts in Salesforce Classic or Lightning Experience.

They access the Channel Management Console in Lightning Experience.


Partner Enablement	One of the supported PRM licenses listed in this topic, plus the Enablement add-on license.	

Channel managers and Enablement team members can design partner enablement programs in Lightning Experience.

Partners can take Enablement Programs from these supported Experience Cloud templates.

Automotive
Aura-based B2B Commerce templates (no longer solid)
Build Your Own (Aura)
Customer Service
Financial Services Client Portal
Insurance Agent Portal
Partner Central
